channel.title: Comments on: An introduction to ClojureScript
channel.description: On programming and text editing. Addicted to lisps.

item.title: By: Oliver Caldwell
item.dc:creator: Oliver Caldwell
item.description:
Thank you very much for this, it means a lot. I hope you can learn from either my mistakes or my non-mistakes :)
I hope I can teach more in the future too! I'll have more to say on Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs in the coming months. Many interesting topics in there.
Happy learning!
item.content:encoded:

I hope I can teach more in the future too! I’ll have more to say on Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs in the coming months. Many interesting topics in there.

Happy learning!

item.title: By: Jason Sebring
item.dc:creator: Jason Sebring
item.description: Just want to say thanks for being a great programmer and proliferating your work for others to use as I came across your link in a bower package.

item.title: By: David Stephan
item.dc:creator: David Stephan
item.description: I have read this blog and for me this blog is worth shared. I have got all the required information which I was wondering about clojurescript.. Thanks for this knowledge. :)
